biotools.summary: Assemblage is a microbial genome assembly pipeline that runs various QC, assembly and post-assembly steps on Illumina PE/SE reads. The different steps of the pipeline are - downsample reads using Seqtk/Mash (optional), clean reads with Trimmomatic, assemble clean reads with SPAdes assembler, perform post-assembly correction with PILON and annotates assembled genome using PROKKA.
